You are most welcome indeed! The piratebay community is my family I love most sharing torrents with, as the sense of social responsibility in what is our mission, is most shared I think by the special folk in this region, broadly speaking. Merci!

thanks SO much!

I have a movie like that (Man on fire 1984) that never came out in DVD, and unfortunately, the spoken language is french and not english. 
I don't know HOW but at some point, I'll make it available to the movie community. Right now I have an ISO file (4GB) and it's huge for only one movie...
